column6: Teach Raichu-Alola *Thunderbolt* and set its held item to *Aloraichium Z*.
Teach Decidueye *Spirit Shackle* and set its held item to *Decidium Z*.
Teach Eevee *Last Resort* and set its held item to *Eevium Z*.
Teach Incineroar *Darkest Lariat* and set its held item to *Incinium Z*.
Teach Kommo-o *Clanging Scales* and set its held item to *Kommonium Z*.
Teach Lunala or Necrozma-Dawn-Wings *Moongeist Beam* and set its held item to *Lunalium Z*.
Teach a Lycanroc *Stone Edge* and set its held item to *Lycanium Z*.
Teach Marshadow *Spectral Thief* and set its held item to *Marshadium Z*.
Teach Mew *Psychic* and set its held item to *Mewnium Z*.
Teach Mimikyu *Play Rough* and set its held item to *Mimikium Z*.
Teach Pikachu *Volt Tackle* and set its held item to *Pikanium Z*.
Teach a Pikachu in a cap (not Pikachu-Starter) *Thunderbolt* and set its held item to *Pikashunium Z*.
Teach Primarina *Sparkling Aria* and set its held item to *Primarium Z*.
Teach Snorlax *Giga Impact* and set its held item to *Snorlium Z*.
Teach Solgaleo or Necrozma-Dusk-Mane *Sunsteel Strike* and set its held item to *Solganium Z*.
Teach a "Tapu" Pokemon *Nature's Madness* and set its held item to *Tapunium Z*.
Teach Necrozma-Dawn-Wings, Necrozma-Dusk-Mane, or Necrozma-Ultra *Photon Geyser* and set its held item to *Ultranecrozium Z*.
Teach ANY 3 Pokemon *Fire Pledge*, *Water Pledge*, and *Grass Pledge* (one each).
